name: theme-professional
title: Professional Educational Theme
author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>
description: Sophisticated theme for post-graduate learners (ages 18+) with information-dense layouts and refined visual treatments

files.content:
{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "theme-professional",
  "type": "registry:theme",
  "title": "Professional Educational Theme",
  "description": "Sophisticated theme for post-graduate learners (ages 18+) with information-dense layouts and refined visual treatments",
  "categories": ["education", "theme", "professional", "post-graduate"],
  "author": "NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "cssVars": {
    "light": {
      "background": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "card": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "card-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "popover": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "popover-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "primary": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "secondary": "oklch(0.35 0.10 220)",
      "secondary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "muted": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "muted-foreground": "oklch(0.50 0 0)",
      "accent": "oklch(0.70 0.20 65)",
      "accent-foreground": "oklch(0.10 0 0)",
      "destructive": "oklch(0.62 0.22 15)",
      "destructive-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "border": "oklch(0.94 0.01 220)",
      "input": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "ring": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "chart-1": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "chart-2": "oklch(0.35 0.10 220)",
      "chart-3": "oklch(0.70 0.20 65)",
      "chart-4": "oklch(0.30 0.12 200)",
      "chart-5": "oklch(0.45 0.08 240)",
      "sidebar": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "sidebar-primary": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "sidebar-primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "sidebar-border": "oklch(0.92 0.015 220)",
      "sidebar-ring": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "radius": "0.5rem"
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "educationalContext": {
      "ageGroup": "18+",
      "cognitiveLevel": "post-graduate",
      "touchTargetMin": "40px",
      "contrastRatio": "precise",
      "visualComplexity": "information-dense",
      "wcagLevel": "AA"
    },
    "designTokens": {
      "fontSizeBase": "14px",
      "lineHeightBase": "1.4",
      "focusWidth": "1px",
      "borderRadius": "0.5rem",
      "minTouchTarget": "40px"
    },
    "colorPalette": {
      "primary": "Navy Blue - Authoritative and trustworthy",
      "secondary": "Slate Gray - Professional and neutral",
      "accent": "Gold - Premium and sophisticated",
      "destructive": "Muted Red - Clear but not disruptive",
      "neutral": "Cool Grays - Clean and efficient"
    },
    "designPrinciples": [
      "Information-dense layouts for efficiency",
      "Sophisticated color palette with premium feel",
      "Precise typography for extended reading",
      "Minimal visual noise to reduce cognitive load",
      "Professional aesthetics suitable for workplace"
    ]
  }
}
